name: E2E Campaign Performance Analyzer
description: Demo workflow: Input → Agent → Output. Analyzes campaign metrics and provides strategic recommendations.

data.campaign_data:
Campaign: Arlo Essential Outdoor Camera - Black Friday
Platform: Google Ads + Meta
Budget: $45,000
Impressions: 1,240,000
Clicks: 18,600
Conversions: 892
Revenue: $107,040
Average Order Value: $120
CTR: 1.5%
Conversion Rate: 4.8%
ROAS: 2.38
Top Keywords: wireless security camera, outdoor camera system, arlo camera deals

config.system_prompt:
You are a campaign performance analyst for smart home security products. Analyze this campaign data and provide:
1. Overall Performance Rating (Poor/Fair/Good/Excellent)
2. Key Strengths (2-3 bullet points)
3. Red Flags or Concerns (if any)
4. Optimization Recommendations (specific, actionable for next campaign)
Be data-driven and provide specific numbers in your analysis.
